Html:
Lets suppose I have a web form which creates a new user account. Lets suppose a user registration form and I want to load my form in a browser and then let my script or code fill the values in text boxes and click the I agree check box and then click submit button

Is this achievable using html agility. If yes, any exmaple ? If no, any other tool ?

Thanks

Yasir
HTML Agility Pack does not do this, it is simply an HTML Parser. For testing HTML user interfaces you'll want to use something like Selenium http://seleniumhq.org/
